ygData.subject: Re: Hmm....
ygData.msgSnippet: Aiya, it s still an official guild in EQ eye, ie with guild abbrev in our name, but unofficial in the sense that we dun run it like an official guild.  In
ygData.messageBody:
Aiya, it's still an 'official' guild in EQ eye, ie with guild abbrev in our
name, but 'unofficial' in the sense that we dun run it like an official
guild. In official guild we need to consider many things like guild
structure, treasury, rankings, titles, activities, small team leadership
etc. This EQ guild just work like a group of friends lor ;)

On Wednesday, May 26, 1999 10:08 AM, Wilson [SMTP:ritzbits@...]
wrote:
> Hmmm...
>
> I don't think there is any way to form an informal guild leh.
>
> Wilson
